remarks: Projecting a Diophantine set by removing a coordinate results in a Diophantine set.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 10-Oct-2014.)
statement:
diophrex $p |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ M e. ( ZZ>= ` N ) /\ S e. ( Dioph ` M ) ) -> { t | E. u e. S t = ( u |` ( 1 ... N ) ) } e. ( Dioph ` N ) ) $.
$d N t u $.
$d S t u $.
